instruction: Set up a signature using my name and affiliation. My name is Anonym and my affiliation is XYZ Lab.

minimal: `CLICK` on the Folder pane options menu (usually three horizontal lines) at the top of the Folder pane
`CLICK` on your email account name in the left pane
`CLICK` on the 'Use HTML' checkbox under 'Signature text'
`CLICK` on your desired signature under the 'Info' tab
`MOVE_TO` right before the HTML code under the 'Code' tab
`DRAG_TO` right after the HTML code under the 'Code' tab
